items.sentence: Why don\'t you call Tom and remind him about the party on Friday?
I just don\'t want you to do something that you\'ll be sorry for.
I wish that Tom wouldn\'t keep telling everyone I\'m his brother.
Let\'s grab a quick lunch at that small coffeeshop near the park.
Love alone isn\'t enough for a successful international marriage.
Next February, I\'ll be going to Australia for one year to study.
Tom was really glad to hear that Mary was going to help him move.
Tom went to his room, changed into his pajamas, and got into bed.
Do you think Tom has any chance of being elected class president?
Even though Tom had promised to pay, he stuck Mary with the bill.
